Richmond.Green Park, Richmond, Virginia:
Green Park is a small neighborhood of approximately 240 homes located in Richmond, Virginia, United States, within the boundaries of the North Side of the city limits.
The Cannon Creek Greenway, a bike/walking trail which will eventually join the East Coast Greenway stretching the length of the U.S. East Coast; Hotchkiss Field; and historic St. Elizabeth's Catholic Church, home parish of Senator Tim Kaine and his family, are landmarks in the community.
